reviews.review_msg: He's smart but a total snob who thinks he's better than everyone. Big ego. Very condescending. Does not know how to create a succinct, useful, well balanced and reasonable workload to grade students. Does not know how to explain things well/in different ways.

Okay he's not really hot, but he's cute enough:)He is an EXCELLENT teacher, and really does make you want to learn. This subject is confusing, and writing this 40% critique REALLY sucks right now, but this course is excellent and he is a VERY fair, friendly, and helpful teacher
